instruction: Compose a children's story on the theme of friendship.
output: Once upon a time, there were two best friends named Jack and Jill. They both lived in the same town and loved spending time together, but they wanted to explore the world and see what it had to offer. So, they set off on an adventure. Along the way they encountered many different people and cultures, but no matter what, they stuck together and their friendship never faltered. After their journey, they returned home having learned important lessons about friendship and life.
